evidence.claim: Colonial Oaks has extensive operations in the senior living sector, which often involves data integration with health-tech standards like HIPAA and FHIR.
The company emphasizes compliance with health data regulations indicating potential use of EHR and HIPAA-compliant services.
Their emphasis on operational efficiency and patient care technologies suggests potential integration capabilities, although specifics are not disclosed.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of using X12 transactions or API automation in their operations.
